Cereal box as a birdhouse: Cut out a few holes in the cereal box and hang it outside to create a birdhouse.
Cereal box as a bird feeder: Cut a few holes in the cereal box and fill it with birdseed to create a DIY bird feeder.
Cereal box as a storage container: Use the cereal box as a storage container for small items like toys or office supplies.
Cereal box as a picture frame: Cut out a few holes in the cereal box and use it as a frame for a photograph or artwork.
Cereal box as a pet bed: Cut off the top of the cereal box and use it as a soft, comfortable bed for your pet.
